Header.title: Kitty Kad
Header.paragraph: First cute meme token for the Kadena blockchain

About.paragraph: This is a tool designed to track prices of tokens native to Kadena listed only on Dexes. It is a work in progress and is one of the many Kitty Kad community projects to help build the Kadena ecosystem (more projects listed below).

Socials.link: Fair launch will happen across DEX's on the Kadena ecosystem

Socials.title: NFTs - Q1 '22
Socials.text: Cat themed NFTs coming to the Kadena blockchain

Socials.title: Games and Dapps - Q2 '22
Socials.text: Community themed games and dapps linked to the Kitty Kad token

Socials.title: Cross-chain - H2 '22
Socials.text: Via Kadena's bridges, the token will be available on more chains to allow more users to join

Projects.title: Kitty Kad Token
Projects.text: A meme token used to power Kitty Kad community projects

Projects.title: Kitty Kad NFTs
Projects.text: Claim limited edition and unique randomly generated Kitty Kad NFTs by burning Kitty Kad tokens

Projects.title: NFTs + Games on flux
Projects.text: Use your NFTs as characters or in game items for games hosted on Flux

Projects.title: Competitions + Bets
Projects.text: Wager Kitty Kad tokens in 1:1 challenges or organised competitions, winner takes the pot
